content.raw:
Loading `heightmap.world` takes much longer when paging is enabled.  On my laptop (admittedly, a MacBook Air, with poor GPU support):

* Without paging:

        Heightmap::Load start: 1378330462.765149
        Heightmap::Load end: 1378330465.431348

* With paging:

        Heightmap::Load start: 1378330414.999794
        Heightmap::Load end: 1378330440.449800

I.e., ~2.5s without paging vs. ~25.5s with paging.  I'll poke around to see where the time goes.
